Driving Motor Retailing

Through Technology

Welcome to FISC

Motor Finance & Insurance Software Specialists

Internationally, we provide OEMs, NSCs, finance companies, dealer motor groups and individual car dealerships with unique tools that maximise customer retention, increase finance renewals, sell more vehicles, increase margins and ensure that F&I sales are maximised and executed in a 100% Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) – compliant manner. We also operate the UK’s most innovative Appointed Representative dealer network.

Customer Retention and Finance Renewals Solutions

eMaster will sell you more vehicles and increase your customer and finance retention. Designed for use by OEMs, finance companies, car and motorcycle dealers, eMaster is the most comprehensive and complete customer retention and finance renewal solution available anywhere, both in the UK and internationally.

Learn More

FCA Compliance Software, Products and Services

We provide motor dealers with a wide range of compliance software, consultancy and training services and our TRACS division operates the UK’s most progressive Appointed Representative network for general insurance.  Our dedicated team of experts can provide you with a range of bespoke compliance advice and solutions tailored exactly to the needs of your business.

Learn More

SOME OF OUR MANUFACTURER PARTNERS INCLUDE:

Our business culture is driven by our senior management team, who have in-depth knowledge of the motor, F&I and compliance industries. This enables our systems and services to be designed with the end users in mind, knowing exactly how they will fit into their business processes.

The quality of our customer service is monitored on an ongoing basis and this results in exceptional levels of client retention driven by detailed product knowledge and a deep understanding of how the systems and services work in our clients' businesses.

We recognise that every company is unique. That's why we specialise in providing bespoke solutions that will exactly fit into your business and processes. This ensures it works better for you and has a real positive impact on your business.

Our services can be used by...

MOTOR DEALERS

Whether you’re a single dealership or a national group, all of our systems are bespoke and scalable to any size of business. Our systems are designed by Dealers for Dealers and will have a huge positive impact on your business. If you want systems that are easy to use and improve your performance, contact us now for a no obligation demonstration.

MOTOR MANUFACTURERS

All of our systems are bespoke, scalable and are white labelled to your brand. We take care of everything from set up and hosting, to training, launch and day to day management. If you want proven systems that work and achieve real results quickly at a fraction of the cost of developing similar in-house solutions, contact us today.

FINANCE COMPANIES

We can offer a range of solutions tailored and branded to your business needs, supporting you and your network as much or as little as you require. We can integrate with your own and your dealers in-house systems, providing you with end to end solutions that will improve performance and retention. Contact us now for a no obligation demonstration.

INSURANCE PROVIDERS

We offer solutions from insurance delivery to FCA training and compliance, all designed to make the sale, delivery and day to day management of insurance products easy and trouble free. If you supply insurance products to the motor sector and are looking for white labelled compliance and delivery software that works, we are your partner contact us now.

SOME OF OUR DEALER PARTNERS INCLUDE:

Our systems are:
  • Web-based
  • Easy to use
  • Bespoke to your requirements
  • Branded to your company CI
  • Easily integrated into your other systems
You get:
  • Motor industry specific systems
  • Cost effective & proven systems & services
  • Classroom and/or virtual training
  • Ongoing updates
  • First class technical support
  • Systems using the latest technology
Follow Fisc

Get Directions

Latest News

FCA Publishes Final Findings On Motor Finance Market

8 March 2019

Following the publication of its interim findings into the motor finance market in March 2018, the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has now published its final findings on the sector. This report focuses on issues relating to commission arrangements, pre-contract disclosures and affordability assessments. As part of this work, the FCA surveyed 20 motor finance providers […]

Read more

TRACS is a division of FISC Limited and a registered trademark.

We have a complaints handling procedure which is available on request. You can also find information about referring a complaint to the Financial Ombudsman (FOS) at http://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/publications/consumer-leaflet.htm
